u= [0.486673621221759, 0.302285513981378, 0.0973802176757624]
u= [0.285630513115614, 0.272665418345791, 0.181612724988541]
u=[0.486673621221759, 0.302285513981378, 0.0973802176757624]
v=[0.285630513115614, 0.272665418345791, 0.181612724988541]

-u = [-0.486673621221759, -0.302285513981378, -0.0973802176757624]
t  = [-0.486673621221759, -0.302285513981378, -0.0973802176757624]
test 'unary -' passed

u-v = [0.201043108106145, 0.0296200956355874, -0.0842325073127786]
t   = [0.201043108106145, 0.0296200956355874, -0.0842325073127786]
test 'operator-' passed

u+v = [0.772304134337373, 0.574950932327169, 0.278992942664303]
t   = [0.772304134337373, 0.574950932327169, 0.278992942664303]
test 'operator+' passed

u*c = [0.33674348432418, 0.209160046487154, 0.0673801750792676]
t   = [0.33674348432418, 0.209160046487154, 0.0673801750792676]
test 'operator*' passed

u%v=0.239117128971083
u.dot(v)=0.239117128971083
d  =0.239117128971083
test 'operator%' passed
test '.dot()' passed
